com.campudus.vertx.sessionmanager.java

Class SessionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.campudus.vertx.sessionmanager.java.SessionHelper

  • public class SessionHelper
extends Object
    This Java wrapper class helps using the session manager from Java. It provides useful functions to handle storing and retrieving session data more easily.
    Author:
    Joern Bernhardt This class was modified for Vertx 2.1 and some methods were added.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      SessionHelper(org.vertx.java.core.Vertx vertx, String sessionManagerAddress, String cookieField, String cookiePath)
      Creates a session helper for this Vertx instance with a custom cookie field name.

      void checkAllSessionsForMatch(org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject json, org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject> doneHandler)
      Checks all sessions for a potential match of the specified JsonObject and returns the reply of the session manager ({ matches : true/false, sessions: [...all matching sessions or empty JsonArray...] }).

      Destroys a session and gives the result to a handler.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SessionHelper

        public SessionHelper(org.vertx.java.core.Vertx vertx)
        Creates a session helper for this Vertx instance.
        Parameters:
        vertx - The Vertx instance to use this session helper. The Vertx is used for the communication over the event bus.

      • SessionHelper

        public SessionHelper(org.vertx.java.core.Vertx vertx,
                     String sessionManagerAddress)
        Creates a session helper for this Vertx instance.
        Parameters:
        vertx - The Vertx instance to use this session helper. The Vertx is used for the communication over the event bus.
        sessionManagerAddress - The address on which the session manager is listening on.

      • SessionHelper

        public SessionHelper(org.vertx.java.core.Vertx vertx,
                     String sessionManagerAddress,
                     String cookieField,
                     String cookiePath)
        Creates a session helper for this Vertx instance with a custom cookie field name.
        Parameters:
        vertx - The Vertx instance to use this session helper. The Vertx is used for the communication over the event bus.
        sessionManagerAddress - The address on which the session manager is listening on.
        cookieField - The name of the generated field in the cookie for the client.
        cookiePath - the path of the cookie

      • putSessionData

        public void putSessionData(org.vertx.java.core.http.HttpServerRequest req,
                           org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject obj,
                           org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject> doneHandler)
        Puts multiple data fields into the session storage and retrieves the result of the storage operation.
        Parameters:
        req - The http server request.
        obj - A JsonObject which includes key-value pairs to store.
        doneHandler - The handler to call after storing finished. It will receive the message sent by the session manager.

      • withSessionId

        public void withSessionId(org.vertx.java.core.http.HttpServerRequest req,
                          org.vertx.java.core.Handler<String> handler)
        Does something with a session id. It will use the session id provided by the client inside the http server request. If it cannot find it, it will create a new session.
        Parameters:
        req - The http server request.
        handler - The handler to call with the created or found session id.

      • getSessionId

        public String getSessionId(org.vertx.java.core.http.HttpServerRequest req)

      • startSession

        public void startSession(org.vertx.java.core.http.HttpServerRequest req,
                         org.vertx.java.core.Handler<String> handlerWithSessionId)
        Creates a new session for the specified request. It will provide the newly created session id as a cookie.
        Parameters:
        req - The http server request, i.e. client, to create a session for.
        handlerWithSessionId - A handler to use the created session id with.

      • destroySession

        public void destroySession(String sessionId,
                           org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject> doneHandler)
        Destroys a session and gives the result to a handler.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - The id of the session to destroy.
        doneHandler - The handler to call with the result of the session manager.

      • checkAllSessionsForMatch

        public void checkAllSessionsForMatch(org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject json,
                                     org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject> doneHandler)
        Checks all sessions for a potential match of the specified JsonObject and returns the reply of the session manager ({ matches : true/false, sessions: [...all matching sessions or empty JsonArray...] }).
        Parameters:
        json - The JsonObject to check against all sessions.
        doneHandler - Handles the result of the session manager.

      • withConnectionStats

        public void withConnectionStats(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject> handler)
        Gets informations about open sessions and delivers this info to the specified handler.
        Parameters:
        handler - The handler to call after getting the results of the connections report.
